original_text: Abner gave Ish-Bosheth authority to rule as king over Gilead, Asher and Jezreel, as well as the tribes of Ephraim and Benjamin. So Ish-Bosheth became king of all Israel.
korean_text: 길르앗과 아술과 이스르엘과 에브라임과 베냐민과 온 이스라엘의 왕으로 삼았더라

sentences.original_text: Abner gave Ish-Bosheth authority to rule as king
sentences.korean_translation: 아브넬은 이스보셋에게 왕으로 다스릴 권한을 주었고

sentences.original_text: as well as the tribes of Ephraim and Benjamin
So Ish-Bosheth became king of all Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 이스보셋이 이스라엘 전체의 왕이 되었다
